body.bibl: Ebied, Rifaat Y. “The Syriac Version of the Treatise on the Origin and History of the Thirty Pieces of Silver Which Judas Received from the Jews.” In Graeco-Latina et Orientalia: Studia in Honorem Angeli Urbani Heptagenarii, edited by Samir Khalil Samir and Juan Pedro Monferrer-Sala, 123–31. Series Syro-Arabica 2. Cordoba: Cordoba Near Eastern Research Unit / Beirut: Centre de Documentation et de Recherches Arabes Chrétiennes, 2013.
